titleStmt.title: A decree of excommunication against such as adhere to the late peace, and doe beare armes for the hereticks of Ireland, or doe aid or assist them by Iohn Baptist Rinuccini, Archbishop and Prince of Firmo, and by the ecclesiasticall congregation of both clergies of the kingdome of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Rinuccini, John Baptist.

notesStmt.note: Rinuccini's name at head of title.
"Dated at Kilkenny in the pallace of our residence, the 5. day of October, 1646"
